column5: Hey guys, Does anyone know where there is shore access to the Niagara river?  Im not looking for anybodys "spot" just a way to get down there, preferably on north stretch of the river.  Ive heard there is a set of stairs that takes you right down there but Ive never found out exactly where it is. Has anybody else heard of these stairs?  Mike
keep googling....they're not that hard to find
Two spots to get down: The whirlpool and the glen. The whirlpool is the classic fishing hole.
Thanks Ainsley, Im defiantly going to have to check them out!
